column1: #: description: Average $v_2${SP} vs. $p_\mathrm{T}$ of prompt D$^0$
column3: and D$^{*+}$ mesons in Pb-Pb collisions at $\sqrt{s_\mathrm{NN}}=5.02$ TeV in the centrality class 30-50% in the rapidity interval $|y|<0.8$. The first (sys
column4: data) error is the systematic uncertainty from all the other sources except for the B feed-down. The second (sys
column5: FD) error is the systematic uncertainty from the B feed-down contribution.
